story_arc: promise → course → data-staircase → pro/con → verdict → alternatives

primary_trope.name: extreme_length
primary_trope.hook_text: Only a handful of races score 5/5 on Length. Traka 360 is one.
primary_trope.mechanism: Curiosity gap (specific) — knowing a perfect score exists but not why triggers dopamine anticipation.

beats.label: HOOK + PROMISE
beats.narration: Should you race Traka 360? I rated 328 gravel races on 14 dimensions. Traka 360 scored 84 out of 100. The Icons tier. Here's what that actually means for your season.
beats.editing_note: STATE THE PREMISE IN 8 SECONDS. Clear value prop: 'I rated 328 races. Here's where this one lands.' This is the 8-second decision window. Viewers who stay past 15s are 58% more likely to finish.
beats.psych_mechanism: Curiosity gap (specific) + IKEA effect (viewer predicts the tier before reveal).

beats.label: THE COURSE
beats.narration: Traka 360. Girona, Catalonia, Spain. 224 mi. Relentless climbing on Mediterranean gravel. 85% gravel with rough sections better suited to MTB. Flowing early terrain gives way to rougher mid-course chunks.
beats.editing_note: Let the course breathe. Show the route map, then cut to terrain-specific B-roll. This is the SETUP phase — grounding the viewer before the data analysis. Pacing: 25-40 sec cuts.

beats.label: THE SCORES — Top 8
beats.narration: Let's go through the scores. Length. 5 out of 5. Ultra distance. Bring lights and a plan. At 360 kilometers, this distance demands multi-day preparation and overnight endurance. Adventure. 5 out of 5. Full expedition mode. Genuine backcountry. Prestige. 5 out of 5. The one people ask about first. Dubbed 'Europe's Unbound'—the most prestigious gravel race on the continent. Race Quality. 5 out of 5. Best-in-class race production. Experience. 5 out of 5. Transformative. People come back different. Field Depth. 5 out of 5. Start line looks like a WorldTour bus exploded. With a field of 4,000+ riders from 74 countries, the strongest gravel field in Europe. Logistics. 4 out of 5. One less thing to worry about. Girona is cycling's European hub with excellent infrastructure, but registration sells out in minutes when it opens in July. Technicality. 4 out of 5. Bike handling matters here. Practice your descents. The course combines everything from smooth hardpack to punishing singletrack.
beats.editing_note: PROGRESSIVE RHYTHM: start tight (15-20 sec per dimension), slow down for the most interesting scores (30-40 sec). Each score: number appears, brief pause, explanation. Avatar reacts to extreme scores (5/5 = chef_kiss, 1/5 = facepalm). RE-ENGAGEMENT at 3:00 mark: insert a surprising score reveal or a meme reaction to break the pattern.

meme_insert.suggested_clip: avatar reaction to most extreme score

beats.label: THE SCORES — Also Scored
beats.narration: The rest. Quick-fire. Elevation. 4 out of 5. Mountain passes on the menu. Community. 4 out of 5. The post-race scene is half the event. Value. 4 out of 5. Good value. More bang for your buck than most. Expenses. 4 out of 5. Affordable. Won't break the bank. Climate. 3 out of 5. Pack for two seasons. Altitude. 2 out of 5. Not enough altitude to blame for your pace.
beats.editing_note: FAST PACING — 7 seconds per dimension. Quick-fire energy change from the deep analysis above. This is a PATTERN INTERRUPT through pacing shift.

beats.label: STRENGTHS
beats.visual: Strengths list overlay with positive visual treatment
beats.editing_note: Warm energy. Each strength gets its own card. Avatar genuinely positive.

strengths: The location: Girona is cycling heaven. The race is the excuse; the destination is the reward.
The international field: 74 countries. This isn't a regional race.
The legitimacy: UCI points, WorldTour crossover athletes, equal prize purse.

beats.label: WEAKNESSES
beats.narration: What they don't put on the website.
beats.visual: Weaknesses list with warning visual treatment
beats.editing_note: MIDPOINT RE-ENGAGEMENT. This is ~55% through. Open with burst sequence (quick cuts, warning sounds). Then deliver weaknesses honestly. Preview what's coming: 'Now, should you actually do this race?' [RIFF HERE] at the transition.

weaknesses: Transatlantic distance: Travel cost and jet lag add complexity for US riders
Crowded early kilometers: 4,000 riders creates bottlenecks
Night racing reality: The 360 almost certainly means riding through darkness

beats.label: LOGISTICS
beats.narration: The logistics. What you actually need to know.
beats.editing_note: Utility section. Lower energy, practical value. Hybrid Tempo: alternate fast logistics items (10-15 sec) with slow map visuals (30 sec).

logistics: Lodging: Book 6+ months early. Race week is chaos. €100-200/night. Consider Barcelona + train to Girona.

beats.label: VERDICT
beats.narration: Verdict: ESSENTIAL EUROPEAN. Yes, if you want Europe's premier gravel experience and can handle 12-18+ hours of racing. Traka delivers WorldTour-level legitimacy, stunning Catalan terrain, and a field from 74 countries. Just be ready for rough sections, Garmin Hill after 300km, and run 44-50mm tires.
beats.editing_note: CLOSE THE MAIN LOOP. 0.5s silence before verdict. Tier badge slams in. Avatar delivers final take. DO NOT signal 'wrapping up' — maintain energy.

beats.label: ALTERNATIVES
beats.narration: If Traka 360 isn't quite right for you. If you want European gravel without the ultra distance: Dirty Reiver. If you want bucket-list adventure: The Rift. If you want guaranteed good weather: Unbound.
beats.editing_note: Bonus value — viewers who reach this point are highly engaged. Cross-reference other videos/races.

beats.label: CTA
beats.narration: Full breakdown on the site. Fourteen scored dimensions. Free race prep kit. Link in the description.
beats.editing_note: End ABRUPTLY after CTA. No 'thanks for watching' wind-down.
beats.engagement_question: Have you raced Traka 360? Did we get the score right? Drop it in the comments.

meme_inserts.suggested_clip: avatar reaction to most extreme score

thumbnail_prompt: South Park style flat cutout character, dramatic pose, 'Traka 360' bold text, tier badge 'THE ICONS', high contrast red/yellow/white, cycling gear, handlebar mustache --ar 16:9 --cref [CHARACTER_URL]

cross_platform_notes.youtube: Primary platform. SEO-optimize title for '[Race Name] review'.
cross_platform_notes.extract_shorts: Pull 3-5 Shorts: hook, biggest surprise score, verdict.
cross_platform_notes.blog: Cross-reference the race profile page for search traffic.
